name: Platformer Demo (KTheiss)
description:
This is a basic one-level platforming demo made in Unity. Its purpose is to demonstrate player movement and collision gameplay. It supports both keyboard and XBOX gamepad input.

Keyboard Controls:

W, S, A, D or arrow keys: Move
Spacebar: Jump
R key: Reset the level

XBOX Gamepad Controls:

Left stick: Move
A button: Jump
RB: Reset the level
